div.p:
We have pleasure to inform you that you have been selected and provisionally appointed as
of Infi News Network Pvt Ltd., with effect from
on the following terms and conditions.

td.p: Your headquarters will be at You will work under the immediate supervision and control of the , and under the overall control of the Group VP/Chief Executive Officer.
You will be responsible for undertaking responsibilities as the Management may assign to you from time to time.
You are liable to be transferred from one job to another, one department to another or from one unit/Branch to another anywhere in India, whether existing at present or to be set up in future.

You will be on probation for a period of six months from . During the probation period, your aptitude, performance of work, relationship with other employees, attendance, punctuality, general discipline, loyalty, and overall contribution to our establishment will be closely observed and evaluated. The period of probation can be extended at the discretion of the Management and you will continue to be on probation till an order of confirmation is issued by the Managing Director in writing.
The Management reserves the right to terminate your employment at any time without assigning any reason during the probation period or extended periods of probation.

Continuation of your employment after the expiry of the six months probation period without a written order of confirmation will only mean that the probation period has been continued without the extended period being specified. It will not in any circumstance mean that you have been confirmed to any permanent post or to any such vacancy that may exist then. You will be on probation, continued on the same terms and conditions as is laid down herein and your service is liable to be terminated at any time.

During six months' probation, you will be eligible for 6 days Casual leave and 6 days Medical leave on pro-rata business. Subsequent to your confirmation in the service of the company, you will be eligible for 12 days Casual leave, 12 days Medical leave. You are eligible for 12 days Annual leave on completion of 12 month continuous service. You will be bound by leave rules and other rules & regulation of the company in force from time to time as are applicable to IndiaFirst Broadcast Network Pvt Ltd employees in force from time to time.
Your monthly CTC is shown in Annexure I herein. Your salary is expected to be kept confidential and not to be shared with your colleagues.
You will be eligible for Provident Fund, ESI and Gratuity as per rules.

Your age of superannuation upon confirmation in service is 60 years. At the same time, the Management reserves the right to terminate your services without assigning any reason whatsoever, by giving you one month’s notice or payment of basic pay in lieu thereof. Similarly, you will be at liberty to resign from the services of the Company upon one month’s notice or payment of basic pay in lieu thereof, after serving a minimum of three years from the date of absorption into the regular service, unless the Management decides otherwise.

Your services can also be terminated prior to attaining the age of 60 years, on account of physical or mental disability or infirmity or for continued ill-health if so certified by the doctor nominated by the Company. In such cases the Management has the right to terminate your services, by serving you one month’s notice in writing or by payment of basic pay in lieu thereof.

You shall devote your time & attention for the services of the company exclusively and shall not engage either directly or indirectly in any other trade, business, employment, avocation, advisory services etc. during the currency of this employment.
You will strictly observe and adhere to the existing rules and regulations of the IndiaFirst Broadcast Network Pvt Ltd and those hereinafter enforced.
Please sign the duplicate copy of this appointment order in token of your acceptance.

div.p: Agreement Regarding Confidential Information, Intellectual Property, and Other

In consideration of my employment or my continued employment by IndiaFirst Broadcast Network Pvt Ltd one of its subsidiaries or affiliates (collectively, “IndiaFirst”), which I acknowledge is employment at will, and the payment to me of a salary or other compensation during my employment, I agree as follows:

td.p: I will not, without IndiaFirst's prior written permission, disclose to anyone outside of IndiaFirst or use in other than IndiaFirst's business, either during or after my employment, any confidential information or material of IndiaFirst or any information or material received by IndiaFirst in confidence from third parties, such as suppliers or customers. If I leave the employment of IndiaFirst or at the request of IndiaFirst, I will return to IndiaFirst all property in my possession belonging to IndiaFirst or received by IndiaFirst from any third party, whether or not containing confidential information and whether stored on an IndiaFirst owned asset or a personally owned asset, including, but not limited to, electronic data, electronic files, diskettes and other storage media, drawings, notebooks, reports, and any other hard copy or electronic documents or records. No employee is prohibited from reporting possible violations of law or regulation to a government agency, as protected by law.

Confidential information or material of IndiaFirst is any information or material: (a) generated or collected by or utilized in the operations of IndiaFirst; received from any third party; obtained from an entity IndiaFirst acquired or in which IndiaFirst purchased a controlling interest (including information or material received by that entity from a third party); or suggested by or resulting from any task assigned to me or work performed by me for or on behalf of IndiaFirst; and (b) which has not been made available generally to the public, whether or not expressed in a document or other medium and whether or not marked "IndiaFirst Confidential" or with any similar legend of IndiaFirst or any third party. Confidential information or material may include, but is not limited to, information and material related to past, present and future development, manufacturing activities, or personnel matters; marketing and business plans; pricing information; customer lists; technical specifications, drawings, and designs; prototypes; computer programs; and databases.

During my employment with IndiaFirst and for two years following the termination of my employment from IndiaFirst for any reason, I will not directly or indirectly solicit, or attempt to or participate or assist in any effort to solicit, any employee of IndiaFirst to be employed or perform services outside of IndiaFirst. For purposes of this Paragraph 3(a), “employee of IndiaFirst” shall mean any employee of IndiaFirst who worked at any time in the 12-month period immediately preceding any actual or attempted solicitation.

I agree that during my employment with IndiaFirst and for one year following the termination of my employment for any reason, I will not directly or indirectly solicit for competitive business purposes any customer with which I was directly or indirectly involved as part of my job responsibilities during the twelve (12) months prior to the termination of my employment with IndiaFirst. I acknowledge that IndiaFirst would suffer irreparable harm if I fail to comply with Paragraph 3(a) or (b), and that IndiaFirst would be entitled to any appropriate relief, including money damages, equitable relief and attorneys’ fees.

I will not disclose to IndiaFirst, use in its business, or cause it to use, any information or material which is confidential to any third party unless authorized by IndiaFirst. In addition, I will not incorporate into any product used and/or sold by IndiaFirst, any copyrighted materials or patented inventions of any third party, unless authorized by IndiaFirst pursuant to Paragraph 5.

I will comply and do all things necessary for IndiaFirst to comply with the laws and regulations of all governments under which IndiaFirst does. The provisions of contracts between any such government or its contractors and IndiaFirst that relate to intellectual property or to the safeguarding of information, and IndiaFirst’s corporate directives, including, without limitation, policies and information technology security standards issued from time to time as well as the IndiaFirst Business Conduct Guidelines as amended from time to time.

I hereby assign to IndiaFirst my entire right, title, and interest in any idea, concept, technique, invention, design (whether the design is ornamental or otherwise), computer programs and related documentation, other works of authorship, mask works, and the like (all hereinafter called "Developments"), hereafter made, conceived, written, or otherwise created solely or jointly by me, whether or not such Developments are patentable, subject to copyright or trademark protection or susceptible to any other form of protection which: (a) relate to the actual or anticipated business or research or development of IndiaFirst or its subsidiaries or (b) are suggested by or result from any task assigned to me or work performed by me for or on behalf of IndiaFirst or its subsidiaries. If, by operation of law such right, title, and interest in Development’s vest in IndiaFirst upon creation, I acknowledge that such right, title, and interest belong to IndiaFirst. Also, I hereby assign to IndiaFirst my entire right, title and interest in any such Developments that were or are suggested by or a result of any task assigned to me, or work performed by me for or on behalf of any entity that IndiaFirst acquired or in which IndiaFirst purchased a controlling interest to the extent that any such right, title and interest is not already owned by said entity. In the case of any "other works of authorship", such assignment or ownership shall be limited to those works of authorship which meet both conditions (a) and (b) above. The above provisions concerning assignment or ownership of Developments apply to Developments created while employed by IndiaFirst in an executive, managerial, professional, product or technical planning, technical, research, programming, developer or engineering capacity (including development, product, manufacturing, systems, applied science, and field engineering) or otherwise.

In connection with any of the Developments assigned by Paragraph 6: I will promptly disclose them in writing to the IndiaFirst’s CEO; and I will, on IndiaFirst 's request, promptly execute a specific assignment of title to IndiaFirst or its designee and do anything else reasonably necessary to enable IndiaFirst or such designee to secure a patent, copyright or other form of protection therefore in the United States and in other countries. In addition, I agree to promptly notify the IndiaFirst’s CEO in writing of any patent or patent application in which I am an inventor, but which is not assigned by Paragraph 6 and which discloses or claims any Development made, conceived, or written while I am employed by IndiaFirst. I also agree to promptly notify the IndiaFirst’s CEO if, after I leave the employment of IndiaFirst, I am contacted by anyone or any entity outside of IndiaFirst regarding any transaction, legal or governmental proceeding, litigation or other legal dispute concerning or relating to any of the Developments assigned by Paragraph 6.

IndiaFirst and its licensees, successors, or assigns (direct or indirect) are not required to designate me as an author of any Development which is subject to Paragraph 6, when it is distributed, publicly or otherwise, or to secure my permission to change or otherwise alter its integrity. I hereby waive and release, to the extent permitted by law, all rights in and to such designation and any rights I may have concerning modifications of such Developments. I understand that any rights, waivers, releases, and assignments herein granted and made by me are freely assignable by IndiaFirst and are for the benefit of IndiaFirst and its subsidiaries, licensees, successors, and assigns.

I agree that IndiaFirst, its services providers and other third parties authorized by IndiaFirst will collect, use, store, make available to those who have a need-to-know, and otherwise process my personal information to establish, maintain and terminate my employment relationship with IndiaFirst and for other legitimate business purposes, anywhere in the world. Such personal information, whether provided to IndiaFirst, its service providers, or third parties directly by me or otherwise gathered, includes my name, photo, contact information, skills, compensation, performance, usage of IndiaFirst assets, background check results, bank account information, and disability or medical information. I will not use for unauthorized purposes nor share with any unauthorized parties, either during or after my employment, any personal information about others to which I may have access during my employment at IndiaFirst. IndiaFirst provides numerous opportunities for social computing through blogs, wikis, social networks, virtual worlds and other social media. I agree to comply with all IndiaFirst policies and practices regarding use of social computing tools and I understand that I am personally responsible for the content I post on any social computing tools (whether on IndiaFirst’s internal platforms or on third party sites) and that any information I post, including any of my personal information, may be made broadly available to others, potentially inside or outside IndiaFirst, who have access to these tools.
The term “subsidiaries,” as used in this Agreement, includes any entity owned or controlled, directly or indirectly, by IndiaFirst Technology LLC.

The term "employment at will," as used in this Agreement, means the employment at the mutual consent of both me and IndiaFirst. Accordingly, either IndiaFirst or I can terminate the employment relationship at will, at any time, with or without cause or advance notice. However, this clause does not relieve me of my responsibility to serve the notice period in accordance with my terms of employment, in the event of my resignation from the services of IndiaFirst

This Agreement supersedes all previous oral or written communications, representations, understandings, undertakings, or agreements relating to the subject matter hereof, except as expressly agreed otherwise by IndiaFirst in writing upon my hire or transfer of employment to IndiaFirst. Any waiver of a term in this Agreement and any amendment to this Agreement may only be made in a writing signed by the CEO or Head of Human Resources for IndiaFirst Technology LLC and myself.

This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of United Arab Emirates. If any provision of this Agreement is unenforceable at law, the remainder shall remain in effect. I recognize that any violation of my obligations described herein would cause IndiaFirst to suffer irreparable harm and can result in disciplinary action, including dismissal from IndiaFirst, and any other appropriate relief for IndiaFirst including money damages, equitable relief and attorney’s fees.
This Agreement shall constitute a part of my terms of employment with IndiaFirst and is executed contemporaneously with my offer of employment/ employment contract with IndiaFirst.

div.p: My agreement, and my acknowledgment of receipt of a copy of this Agreement, are indicated by my signature below.
